promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic basic goat fire-type wearing white armor. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Blaziti, a gigantic basic goat fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: flame-wheel. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word goat or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, goat-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: A mammoth furnace dweller. Lurks near scalding hot reefs, able to form rolling fireballs of defense. Brilliant orange blaze illuminates its home.
